description.raw:
This PR depends on [this ign-physics PR](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/52/). This allows the physics system to respect the `<mesh><scale>` SDF element that can be set by users.

However, we should wait to merge this, because I’ve noticed that rendering engine does not seem to account for the SDF mesh scale currently. I’m honestly not sure how to adjust a mesh’s scale for the renderer. If anyone knows how to make that happen, please feel free to make the change in this PR, and then we can consider merging it.

The related `ign-physics` PR can be merged at any time without any negative side effects.
